sub_title: Solution Architect, Scrummaster, Agile Coach and IT Professional. Combining Science with Technologie, Change & Innovation.
summary:
(Azure) Cloud consultant/Developer/Analyst - Agile Consultant - Professional Scrum Master & Product Owner

Jaap operates from a vision and is very results oriented. His vision is not limited to the boundaries of the project but Jaap puts the project clearly in the context of the organization. Thanks to his strong analytical and communication abilities, Jaap is able to understand complex issues quickly and make them clear to team members and clients. Jaap enjoys coaching the team on content issues: architecture, design, programming and testing. His flexibility and wide experience in various project contexts makes Jaap  very versatile.  Besides his individual contribution there also will be available Jaap's knowledge and experience of many years of programming and architecture. As a highly trained, motivated generalist Jaap - independently or in teams – is ideally suited to produce complex issues of modern architecture and software engineering (UML, CBD, OO, development streets, Internet, etc.). Jaap has a long experience concerning thinking in concepts and the practical ability to translate these concepts into workable solutions for the client. Jaap is often the force behind the substantive directions of complex projects.

Specialties: SharePoint, Azure DevOps, SaFe, Agile transformations & coaching, Azure Solution Architectures, Power BI, Power Apps, Power Automate, Azure 204, 900, 400, Team Foundation Server, OOAP, MVC ASP, Visual Studio, Microsoft Office, Scrum, CAPM, UML, Azure, Silverlight/WPF, Software Development Life Cycle Management, Project Management, Business Process Management, Web Design and Marketing
